name: Don't Drop The Ball! Scary Prank
name_original: Don't Drop The Ball! Scary Prank
description:
The best prank game on App Store!

Note: this game is intended for entertainment purposes only

Appears to be a challenging and addictive balance the ball game,

Tilt your phone to control the ball,

Move the ball into the billard hole!

A test of your balancing skill!

But that's not all......
When you finally reach the end, there is a scream of a surprise waiting for you!

Turn up your sound volume!

From icon, game menu to level selection, everything looks just like a normal game!

Challenge your friends to solve the maze, have a good laugh as they jump up and scream!

Warning: This application may be too scary for some people.

Warning: people may drop your device. Play in controlled environment only! 

Warning: The developers of this app are NOT responsible for any apple device damages or accidents.

Support iPhone&iPad!
